original_text: Shema became the father of Raham, who became the father of Jorkeam. Rekem became the father of Shammai.
korean_text: 세마는 라함을 낳았으니 라함은 요르그암의 아버지이며 레겜은 삼매를 낳았고

sentences.original_text: Shema became the father of Raham
who became the father of Jorkeam
Rekem became the father of Shammai
